# jackal tools registry catalog
<!-- Auto-generated by hack/gen-cli-docs.sh -->

List the repos in a registry

```
jackal tools registry catalog REGISTRY [flags]
```

## Examples

```

# List the repos internal to Jackal
$ jackal tools registry catalog

# List the repos for reg.example.com
$ jackal tools registry catalog reg.example.com

```

## Options

```
      --full-ref   (Optional) if true, print the full image reference
  -h, --help       help for catalog
```

## Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --allow-nondistributable-artifacts   Allow pushing non-distributable (foreign) layers
      --insecure                           Allow image references to be fetched without TLS
      --platform string                    Specifies the platform in the form os/arch[/variant][:osversion] (e.g. linux/amd64). (default "all")
  -v, --verbose                            Enable debug logs
```
